solution_line_template: Since each chapter of the book has {pages_per_chapter} pages, Mitchell had read {num_chapters_initial}*{pages_per_chapter} = <<{num_chapters_initial}*{pages_per_chapter}={pages_from_first_ten_chapters}>>{pages_from_first_ten_chapters} pages from the first ten chapters.

After reading {pages_in_11th_chapter} pages of the eleventh chapter, the total number of pages that Mitchell had read is {pages_from_first_ten_chapters}+{pages_in_11th_chapter} = <<{pages_from_first_ten_chapters}+{pages_in_11th_chapter}={total_pages_after_11th_chapter_partial}>>{total_pages_after_11th_chapter_partial}

The next {num_additional_chapters} chapters that she read had {num_additional_chapters}*{pages_per_chapter} = <<{num_additional_chapters}*{pages_per_chapter}={pages_from_additional_chapters}>>{pages_from_additional_chapters} pages.

In total, Mitchell read {total_pages_after_11th_chapter_partial}+{pages_from_additional_chapters} = <<{total_pages_after_11th_chapter_partial}+{pages_from_additional_chapters}={total_pages_read}>>{total_pages_read} pages of the book that day.
